    • Snake

      public Snake(int x, int y)
      Constructor creates snake at specified starting coordinates Initializes with 3 initial blocks
      Parameters:
      x - Starting x-coordinate
      y - Starting y-coordinate

      Move snake in a specified direction
      Parameters:
      movement - Desired movement direction

    • moveSnake

      public void moveSnake()
      Move snake in the last known direction

    • setBlockBuffer

      public void setBlockBuffer(int addition)
      Adjusts snake length via block buffer Prevents snake from shrinking below 3 blocks
      Parameters:
      addition - Number of blocks to add or remove

    • selfCollisionCheck

      public boolean selfCollisionCheck()
      Checks if snake has collided with itself
      Returns:
      True if self-collision occurs, false otherwise

    • getHeadX

      public int getHeadX()
      Returns:
      X-coordinate of snake's head

      Returns:
      Y-coordinate of snake's head

    • delete

      public void delete()
